articles.title: Live: President Biden News Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: President Biden’s plan to cut emissions almost in half by 2030 would require Americans to transform the way they drive, heat their homes and manufacture goods. It is expected to be announced Thursday and timed with a global summit meeting.

articles.title: You've been vaccinated. So what should you do with your vaccine record card? - CBS News
articles.description: Millions of Americans are getting CDC-issued "vaccination record" cards. Here's what to do with them.

articles.author: Channel NewsAsia
articles.title: Train To Busan actor to star in, produce US remake of Korean series Trap - CNA
articles.description: Ma Dong-seok, who’s also known as Don Lee, will play a detective investigating a group of hunters who attacked a famous news anchor and his family while on a camping trip. This is a rare instance of an American remake of a Korean show featuring a Korean lead.
